android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.collisions

Class BoundingCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.collisions.BoundingCircle

  • public class BoundingCircle
extends Object
    Author:
    Edward van Raak This class will create bounding circle for collision detection between game-objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double centerX
      X coordinate of the center of the circle
      private double centerY
      Y coordinate of the center of the circle
      private GameObject gameobject
      GameObject class that is the holder of this class instance
      private boolean isPartOfObject
      Boolean to check what contructor has been used.
      private double radius
      Radius of the circle

      Construct a bounding circle for collision detection between game-objects.

      Check whenever the given circle CENTER is being contained inside this circle

      Check whenever the given circle intersects this circle.
      void moveToCentorOfGameObject()
      Place this Bounding Circle in the middle of a GameObject sprite The location is calculated by taking the width and height of the sprite that it's using.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoundingCircle

        public BoundingCircle(GameObject gameobject,
              double radius,
              double centerX,
              double centerY)
        Construct a bounding circle for collision detection between game-objects.
        Parameters:
        gameobject - The gameobject that is using this BoundingCircle
        radius - The radius of the circle
        centerX - X coordinate of the center of the circle
        centerY - Y coordinate of the center of the circle

      • BoundingCircle

        public BoundingCircle(double radius,
              double centerX,
              double centerY)
        Construct a bounding circle for collision detection.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the circle
        centerX - X coordinate of the center of the circle
        centerY - Y coordinate of the center of the circle

    • Method Detail

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(BoundingCircle intersectedCircle)
        Check whenever the given circle intersects this circle.
        Parameters:
        intersectedCircle - The circle that should be tested for intersection
        Returns:
        True if collision was detected, false if no collision was detected

      • contains

        public boolean contains(BoundingCircle containedCircle)
        Check whenever the given circle CENTER is being contained inside this circle
        Parameters:
        containedCircle -
        Returns:
        True if the center was inside. False is the center was outside.

      • fullycontains

        public boolean fullycontains(BoundingCircle containedCircle)
        Check whenever the given circle RADIUS is being contained inside this circle
        Parameters:
        containedCircle -
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the distance

      • moveToCentorOfGameObject

        public void moveToCentorOfGameObject()
        Place this Bounding Circle in the middle of a GameObject sprite The location is calculated by taking the width and height of the sprite that it's using.
